title: Western Digital to Raise $3.09 Billion in Sandisk Share Sale
description: Western Digital Corp. is seeking to raise $3.09 billion from the sale of a stake in Sandisk Corp., the flash-memory unit that it spun off nearly a full year ago.
content: Western Digital Corp. is seeking to raise $3.09 billion from the sale of a stake in Sandisk Corp., the flash-memory unit that it spun off nearly a full year ago.
